name: Solitaire - The Classic Look
description:
Classic solitaire for the win!
Do you love brain teasers? What about card games? If yes, then you'll love Solitaire: Relaxing Card Game!
Traditional solitaire gameplay. Be patient and pay attention if you want to beat levels.
Try and win as fast as possible to get the max number of points!
Why you'll love Solitaire: Relaxing Card Game!
- Fun classic gameplay without any annoying new twists
- Solitaire nostalgia. The good old days are back!
- Calming visual style, pretty cards and smooth animations
- Easy controls: double-tap a card or drag it. It always goes where it fits
- Simple interface
Download Solitaire: Relaxing Card Game now and have fun for free!
